meanings.definition: The length of time for which a person or animal lives.
meanings.sent1: Some animals have short lifespans, while others live for many years.
meanings.sent2: The study of lifespans helps us understand how long different species can live.
meanings.sent3: It's funny to think about how lifespans vary so much between different types of creatures.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, our lifespans are just a tiny blip in the universe.
meanings.sent5: The lifespans of turtles can span several decades, making them fascinating creatures to observe.

meanings.definition: The duration of existence of an individual.
meanings.sent1: The lifespans of trees can be hundreds of years, outlasting many generations of humans.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the lifespans of different plants is important for gardening and conservation.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing to think about the lifespans of trees compared to the short lives of insects.
meanings.sent4: The lifespans of stars can be billions of years, making them seem eternal in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The lifespans of mountains are so long that they seem almost timeless in our fast-paced world.
